src:
Eibar mesec dana nije mogao nikog da dobije, a onda postao maksimalan
Posle Viljareala tim Marka Dmitrovića savladao i Leganes

03 Nov 2019

Mučio se Eibar ceo oktobar da nađe odgovarajući ritam, dao samo jedan gol na tri utakmice, a onda je ove sedmice zablistao i sa dve vezane pobede isplivao iz opasne zone. Posle slavlja nad Viljarealom u četvrtak veče, izborenim tek u nadoknadi vremena, tim sa Ipurue opet je do važnog trijumfa stigao u završnici. Ovoga puta stradao je Leganes u gostima, što uspehu ekipe našeg reprezentativca Makra Dmitrovića daje na značaju – 2:1.
U vanrednoj rundi tvorac preokreta bio je Fabio Oreljana, a sjajnu formu potvrdio je na Butarkeu, jer je šest minuta pre kraja uposlio Kikea, a 29-godišnji napadač se postarao da bodovi odu za Eibar.
Bio je to šok za domaćina, koji je poveo u ranoj fazi susreta, ali na neki način i namirena pravda, jer je El Nesirija prethodio, čini se, faul nad Dmitrovićem.
Ako Marko Dmitrović ima razloga za radost, onda bi trener Selte Fran Eksriba mogao da se zamisli za posao. Ekipa iz Galicije opet nije pobedila, a posle Alavesa, Sosijedada i Betisa položila je oružje i pred Hatefeom. Još na Balaidosu – 0:1.
Jedini gol na meču delo je Brazilca Kenedija, letos pristiglog iz Njukasla, što je bilo dovoljno da se sastav Nemanje Maksimovića (ušao osam minuta pre kraja) vine do sedme pozicije, a Selta ostane u opasnoj zoni. Gde joj je i mesto posle samo jednog trijumfa u minulih deset susreta.

ŠPANIJA 1 - 12. kolo

Levante - Barselona 3:1 (0:1)/Kampanja 62, Majoral 63, Radoja 68 - Mesi 34. penal/
Sevilja - Atletiko Madrid 1:1 (1:0)/Vaskez 28 – Morata 60/
Real Madrid – Betis 0:0
NedeljaValjadolid – Majorka  3:0 (1:0)/Fernandez 40, Unal 50, Ramirez 94/
Viljareal – Atletik Bilbao  0:0
 
Osasuna – Alaves 4:2 (3:1)/Garsija 20, Ćimi Abila 26, Tores 45+6 pen, Viljar 55 pen – Lagvardija 27, Perez 51 pen/
Selta – Hetafe 0:1 (0:1)/Kenedi 37/
Leganes – Eibar 1:2 (1:1)/En Nesri 6 – Šarls 17, Kike 84/



21.00:  (3,00) Granada (3,10)  Real Sosijedad (2,50)

text:
Eibar could not get anyone for a month, then became maximum
After Villarreal, Marko Dmitrovic's team also defeated Leganes

03 Nov 2019

Eibar struggled all October to find the right pace, scored just one goal in three games, and then this week he shone and emerged with two tied wins from the danger zone. After celebrating Villarreal on Thursday night, selected just to make up time, the team from Ipurue again reached the important triumph in the final. This time Leganes was injured in the away game, which gives the success of our team member Makr Dmitrovic - 2: 1.
In the extraordinary round, Fabio Oreljana was the creator of the turnaround and confirmed his brilliant form at Butarke, as he hired Kike six minutes before the end, and the 29-year-old striker made sure Eibar scored.
It was a shock for the host, who led in the early stages of the match, but in some ways settled justice, as El Nessiri had been preceded by a foul over Dmitrovic.
If Marko Dmitrovic has reason to be happy, then Celta coach Fran Exriba might think of a job. The team from Galicia did not win again, and after Alaves, Sociedad and Betis laid down their weapons before Hatefe. More on Balaidos - 0: 1.
The only goal of the match was the work of Brazilian Kennedy, who arrived from Newcastle this summer, which was enough to bring Nemanja Maksimovic (eight minutes before the end) to the seventh position, leaving Celta in the danger zone. Where is her place after just one triumph in the past ten meetings?
